name: ZOMBIE LAST STANDS
description:
ZOMBIE LAST STANDS is a 'Historical Last Stand' simulation featuring...zombies!

In this first episode we go back 1879, to the Zulu War, where a small detachment of British soldiers garrisoning a remote farmhouse must hold out until help finally arrives.

- Frantic RealTime action, with 'PauseMode', thinking time!
- Hordes of disgusting zombies on screen
- Beautifully hand drawn graphic novel style cutscenes
- Haunting soundtrack and ambient music
- Story written by ALEX SCARROW, international bestselling author of award winning seen series TIMERIDERS.

-NO IN-GAME PURCHASES NEEDED!
-NO IN-GAME ADS!
-NO RATING NAGS
